Pre-Game Insights: Experts predict India as the favorites given their quality and experience, but Sri Lanka can still put up a strong challenge.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo is expected to be challenging for the batters, with early swing and seam movement for the fast bowlers, followed by the turn for the spinners.
Others: The first ODI between Sri Lanka and India ended in a tie after India were unable to get past the 230-run total set by Sri Lanka.
The series is well and truly alive for either India or Sri Lanka to win, if they emerge victorious in the next two ODIs.
